stories.text: Books and blog posts are written about observability and telemetry, but authors haven't include concrete examples of what metrics/analytics they're monitoring.  Which are you monitoring for your kind of system?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are your most important system metrics being monitored?

Homomorphic Encryption can now be used by anyone, without knowing cryptography
The Network Is the Computer: A Conversation with John Gage

stories.text:
I am searching for a nice serialization format which offers a binary and plaintext representation and which allows to specify validation rules.

It seems like reinventing a wheel. And the wheel seems to be ASN.1 as far as I understood.

Could you maybe guide me from your experience why many other serialization formats were invented and why not everybody uses ASN.1 where you already get all kinds of RFCs (e.g 5280) or ISO standards on how to define for example a representation of a TLS certificate and and such.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why is there protobuf,Avro,JSON Schema,etc. instead of ASN.1?
